story: In the shadowed Realm of Eternal Dusk, darkness has a tangible presence, and the undead roam freely. The cursed King of Shadows, Zarothus the Unyielding, rules with an iron grip, fueled by his insatiable hunger for power. His minions, Dravoxus the Wraith and Xenar the Ephemeral, spread fear and despair wherever they tread.
greetingGameMessage: Welcome to the Realm of Eternal Dusk, traveler. Beware the looming shadows, for they hide darker secrets than you can fathom.
defeatEndingMessage: With the defeat of the Cursed King of Shadows, Zarothus the Unyielding, light begins to trickle back into the Realm of Eternal Dusk. The oppressive darkness lifts, and hope blooms once more in the hearts of its inhabitants.
gameOverMessage: Darkness descends upon the Realm of Eternal Dusk as Zarothus the Unyielding and his minions emerge victorious. The land succumbs to eternal night, and all that once thrived fades into shadow.
